thread.title: Taylor Swift lookalike confuses fans: ‘She looks more like Taylor than Taylor’
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift lookalike confuses fans: ‘She looks more like Taylor than Taylor’

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Taylor Swift lookalike confuses fans: ‘She looks more like Taylor than Taylor’
text:
There are countless Taylor Swift lookalikes on Instagram that might look just a little bit like the blonde singer. 
But this one is SO good – she even has Swifty’s fans fooled. 
She has her exact blonde side-swept fringe and her facial features are almost identical to Taylor’s. 
April Gloria is a cosplayer from Kansas that often takes to Instagram to pose for Taylor Swift-inspired selfies. Taylor Swift lookalike April Gloria (Photo: april_gloria/Instagram) The real Taylor Swift (Photo: REX) 
The model and costume maker embraces her resemblance to the star and shares her love of cats – often posing with her cat in photos shared with her 70.3k Instagram followers. 
She also shares her love of bold lip colour and often wears Taylor’s signature slick of bright red lipstick. 
“Omg she looks just like Taylor Swift!” one fan commented. April looks just like Taylor Swift in this selfie (Photo: april_gloria/Instagram) April loves wearing bold lipstick like Taylor (Photo: april_gloria/Instagram) 
“Ummm this girl looks more like Taylor than Taylor,” another added. 
“She looks so much like her!” a third fan wrote. 
While other fans commented that it’s been “so long” since the real Taylor posted casual selfies to Instagram. Fans can't get over how much she looks like Taylor (Photo: april_gloria/Instagram) 
These days Taylor Swift shares mostly professionally shot pictures with her 97.5m followers. 
Last week, Taylor performed her first and last show of 2017. 
The Blank Space star performed a pre-Super Bowl concert in Houston, Texas, on Saturday night and told the audience at Club Nomadic they were attending "100 per cent" of her 2017 concert dates. 
She said: "As far as I know I'm only doing one show in 2017, and as far as I know, this is that show. You are attending 100 per cent of my tour dates." Like us on Facebook
